resources.string: To order a fantastic pizza using our mobile Android app you can follow these simple instructions. Following this message you will be given the option of your pizza size followed immediately by a choice of your favorite crust options. After selecting your crust, you will taken to your topping selection screen, where you will be required to choose the topping you would like on your pizza. here you will have the option to select which side of the pizza you would like your toppings to be on.
